test.name: Caso de Teste 01: Logar no YouTube

kw.name: Set Appium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout in seconds used by various keywords.

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

test.name: Caso de Teste 03: Pesquisar canal “Prime Experts”​

kw.name: Set Appium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout in seconds used by various keywords.

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: E pesquise um vídeo sobre "Prime Experts"​
Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Prime Experts' into text field 'id=search_edit_text'

kw.name: Press Keycode
kw.doc: Sends a press of keycode to the device.

kw.name: E acessar o canal da Prime​
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.arg: xpath=//android.view.ViewGroup[contains(@content-desc,"Prime Experts - Parceria entre Prime Control e UniBrasil ")]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.arg: xpath=//android.view.ViewGroup[contains(@content-desc,"Prime Experts - Parceria entre Prime Control e UniBrasil ")]
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//android.view.ViewGroup[contains(@content-desc,"Prime Experts - Parceria entre Prime Control e UniBrasil ")]'.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.
